glyphs.name: Compassion
glyphs.lore: The heart symbol represents the fundamental force that binds all beings together in mutual care and understanding.

glyphs.name: Wisdom
glyphs.lore: The yin-yang symbol shows how opposing forces create harmony and deeper insight through their dynamic interaction.

glyphs.name: Growth
glyphs.lore: The sprouting seed represents the endless potential within every individual to evolve and flourish.
